channel.title: playerHasItems in clickingmost.java?
channel.description:
I know you have to make a new client object, but I am not sure exactly how to. I know it should be something like client c = new client(...................);
I am trying to use the playerHastItem method from client.java, so I need to access the client class.

item.title: playerHasItems in clickingmost.java?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Doesn’t it already have an object? Most server should do.

Just use c.variable

Read full topic
